com.easemob.chat
类 EMNotifier

java.lang.Object
  com.easemob.chat.EMNotifier

public class EMNotifier
extends java.lang.Object

the notifier class is responsible to handle message notification

  • if app is running in forgound, we will directly send message to app through intent broadcast
  • however, if app is running in background, the broadcast receiver has been unregister for activity, so: 1. chatsdk will send system notification for this message. and also keep a in memory notifyMessageList 2. when app back to foreground (EMChatManager::onMainActivityResume called), we will try to delivery those msgs using intent again

    • 方法摘要
    static EMNotifier getInstance(Context context)
               
     void notifyOnNewMsg()
              手机震动和声音提示
     void stop()
